title: INtravel
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Earn 15% cash back at Lululemon with Rakuten
items.description: Looking to score extra rewards shopping at Lululemon? On November 8th, you can earn 15% cash back on Lululemon purchases through Rakuten.

items.title: 5 things you didn’t know airline miles and skin care products had in common
items.description: Discover five ways airline miles and e.l.f. SKIN’s Vitamin C + E + Ferulic Serum prove you can enjoy luxury results without the luxury price tag.

items.title: The best rewards cards to add to your wallet in 2025
items.description: With so many options available, it can be hard to know which rewards credit card is right for you. Here are four suggestions from a TPG expert.

items.title: New favorite Chase Sapphire Reserve benefit: Stack your hotel credit with Points Boost
items.description: Stacking perks and benefits is how you take a good deal to a great one — here's how I'm doing that with a new Chase Sapphire Reserve card benefit.

items.title: You can now earn Bilt Rewards points when shopping online through Rakuten
items.description: Now you can earn Bilt points when shopping through Rakuten. It's easy to link your account, and there are some limited time offers available to Bilt m...
